comments.author: Binity
comments.body: I did not find a roadmap. How do you plan to develop the project. What is most important for you?

comments.author: Cryptozaika
comments.body: Blockchain can be used in different spheres including finance but the most important is to realize all plan ideas and to understand all steps of realizations of ideas the roadmap is important.

comments.author: pbmcoin_official
comments.body: Take a look at PBMC roadmap

comments.author: Backed_Finance
comments.body: I just checked your roadmap. According it your whitepaper is ready. Can you give the link the Whitepaper to know more about PBMC platform?

comments.author: Coinmaster2.5
comments.body: Please explain me about PBMC platform coin fund. How does it work?

comments.author: verushka
comments.body: What additional features do you plan to launch in the 3rd quarter of 2023?

comments.author: Cryptozaika
comments.body: Quote from: verushka on August 04, 2023, 01:38:12 PMWhat additional features do you plan to launch in the 3rd quarter of 2023?Roadmap is very important for every project. But must most important is to follow the roadmap. The trust is the most important thing in the cryptocurrency and when the project follow the roadmap the trust to it increase.

comments.body: Quote from: Cryptozaika on August 05, 2023, 08:06:12 AMQuote from: verushka on August 04, 2023, 01:38:12 PMWhat additional features do you plan to launch in the 3rd quarter of 2023?Roadmap is very important for every project. But must most important is to follow the roadmap. The trust is the most important thing in the cryptocurrency and when the project follow the roadmap the trust to it increase.To follow the roadmap is very important but the most important as I think is to create a project that is really necessary for people and will be in demand for a long time.

comments.author: Bertyda
comments.body: Quote from: Corsac on August 05, 2023, 08:41:12 AMQuote from: Cryptozaika on August 05, 2023, 08:06:12 AMQuote from: verushka on August 04, 2023, 01:38:12 PMWhat additional features do you plan to launch in the 3rd quarter of 2023?Roadmap is very important for every project. But must most important is to follow the roadmap. The trust is the most important thing in the cryptocurrency and when the project follow the roadmap the trust to it increase.To follow the roadmap is very important but the most important as I think is to create a project that is really necessary for people and will be in demand for a long time.Now during the fall of the market it is a very difficult time for all cryptocurrency market but during the fall of the market only the best and most useful projects will be able to survive.

comments.author: brat111111
comments.body: Quote from: Bertyda on August 05, 2023, 10:25:40 AMNow during the fall of the market it is a very difficult time for all cryptocurrency market but during the fall of the market only the best and most useful projects will be able to survive.Fall of the market is very difficult time but it is necessary to remember that after the fall of the market will be a rise of market, but not all the projects will be able to survive during the fall of the market. If the project will be able to survive during the fall of the market it will have a big success during the rise of the market.

comments.author: Garsipop
comments.body: Quote from: brat111111 on August 06, 2023, 07:59:50 AMQuote from: Bertyda on August 05, 2023, 10:25:40 AMNow during the fall of the market it is a very difficult time for all cryptocurrency market but during the fall of the market only the best and most useful projects will be able to survive.Fall of the market is very difficult time but it is necessary to remember that after the fall of the market will be a rise of market, but not all the projects will be able to survive during the fall of the market. If the project will be able to survive during the fall of the market it will have a big success during the rise of the market.After the fall of the market will be its rise and it is necessary just to wait for such rise. But during the fall of the market only the best projects will survive that are really necessary for people and will be in demand for a long time. The price of such tokens will continue to rise during the rise of the market.

comments.author: InpulseX
comments.body: Quote from: Garsipop on August 06, 2023, 09:13:30 AMAfter the fall of the market will be its rise and it is necessary just to wait for such rise. But during the fall of the market only the best projects will survive that are really necessary for people and will be in demand for a long time. The price of such tokens will continue to rise during the rise of the market.Now it is very difficult time for the cryptocurrency industry. People think that soon cryptocurrency market will grow. But nobody knows when cryptocurrency market will grow and hard to predict how much will be such growth.

comments.author: cryptosru
comments.body: Quote from: InpulseX on August 06, 2023, 11:11:35 AMQuote from: Garsipop on August 06, 2023, 09:13:30 AMAfter the fall of the market will be its rise and it is necessary just to wait for such rise. But during the fall of the market only the best projects will survive that are really necessary for people and will be in demand for a long time. The price of such tokens will continue to rise during the rise of the market.Now it is very difficult time for the cryptocurrency industry. People think that soon cryptocurrency market will grow. But nobody knows when cryptocurrency market will grow and hard to predict how much will be such growth.Summer is not a good time for the rise of the market. The business and investment activity is not very high and it is very difficult time for growth.

comments.author: Cryptozaika
comments.body: Quote from: cryptosru on August 07, 2023, 07:51:25 AMSummer is not a good time for the rise of the market. The business and investment activity is not very high and it is very difficult time for growth.The situation on cryptocurrency market depends too much on the total economic situation in the world. Now the economical situation in the world is so difficult that people simple do not have enough money for investment and crypto projects do not have have enough money for the development of the projects and realization of all their ideas.

comments.author: Zaichonok
comments.body: A lot depends how useful is a product and what it offers. Now there are a lot of different trading platforms but a lot depends how useful they are.

comments.body: Quote from: Zaichonok on August 07, 2023, 11:42:07 AMA lot depends how useful is a product and what it offers. Now there are a lot of different trading platforms but a lot depends how useful they are.Now there are a lot of different trading platforms but a lot depends how useful tools they offer for their traders and how compfortable to work with them and how safe they are.

It is necessary not to trust the developers of the project but check all the provided information and check the development of the project to understand it better.

Now there are a lot of different trading platforms but a lot depends how useful they are.Now there are a lot of different trading platforms but a lot depends how useful tools they offer for their traders and how compfortable to work with them and how safe they are.Now there are so many scams that it is necessary to check everything. It is necessary not to trust the developers of the project but check all the provided information and check the development of the project to understand it better.Safety is very important thing for all trading finance platform. People must be sure that their funds are kept in a safe place. To do this trust is important.

comments.author: Binity
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoserega on August 08, 2023, 12:50:07 PMSafety is very important thing for all trading finance platform. People must be sure that their funds are kept in a safe place. To do this trust is important.But when the platform start to work it is very hard to say how it is safe. The tests of the platform does not help. Only time can show how safe is the platform.
